get.description:
Retrieves paginated list of all published blog posts with optional filtering.
      
      **Features:**
      - Pagination support with configurable page size
      - Full-text search across title, excerpt, and content
      - Tag-based filtering for content categorization
      - Author-based filtering for content discovery
      - SEO-optimized response format
      - Cached responses for improved performance
      
      **Filtering Options:**
      - `search`: Search term for full-text search
      - `tags`: Comma-separated list of tag IDs
      - `author_id`: Filter by specific author ID
      
      **Response includes:**
      - Blog post summaries with metadata
      - Author information and publication dates
      - Tag associations and comment counts
      - Featured image references
      - SEO metadata and reading time estimates

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 10, max: 100)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for full-text search across title, excerpt, and content

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tag IDs for filtering

post.description:
Creates a new blog post with comprehensive content management features.
      
      **Admin Features:**
      - Full content creation with HTML/Markdown support
      - SEO optimization with custom titles and descriptions
      - Tag association for content categorization
      - Featured image assignment for visual appeal
      - Publication scheduling and status management
      - Draft mode for content preparation
      
      **Content Management:**
      - Automatic slug generation from title (with collision handling)
      - Content sanitization for security
      - Metadata storage for flexible content attributes
      - Author attribution from JWT context
      
      **Validation:**
      - Title: 3-255 characters, required
      - Content: Required, sanitized for XSS prevention
      - Slug: Auto-generated if not provided, must be unique
      - Featured image: Must be valid media UUID
      - Tags: Array of valid tag UUIDs
      - SEO fields: Optimized length limits
